song.title: Here I Am to Worship
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .E B F#m E B A
[1] .E B Light of the world . F#m You stepped down into darkness .E B A Opened my eyes let me see || .E B F#m Beauty that made this heart adore You .E B A Hope of a life spent with You
[C] . E Here I am to worship . B Here I am to bow down . E/G# A Here I am to say that You're my God || . E You're altogether lovely . B Altogether worthy . E/G# A Altogether wonderful to me
--- ; Order 1 c 2 c(x2) b(x4) c(x2) [2] .E B F#m King of all days O so highly exalted .E B A Glorious in Heaven above || .E B F#m Humbly You came to the earth You created .E B A All for love's sake became poor
[B] . B E A I'll never know how much it costs . B E A To see my sin up on that Cross
[t] .E B Call upon the Name of the Lord . C#m A And be saved
song.author: Tim Hughes
